contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Okres snina.png|thumb|right|350px|Location of [[Snina District]] in the [[Prešov Region]].]] '''Zboj''' is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in '''[[Snina District]]''' in the '''[[Prešov Region]]''' of north-eastern '''[[Slovakia]]'''. ==History== In [[history|historical records]] the [[village]] was first mentioned in 1567. ==Geography== The [[municipality]] lies at an [[altitude]] of 356 metres and covers an [[area]] of 50.542 km². It has a [[population]] of about 455 people. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html *[http://www.iabsi.com/gen/public/settlements/SL_Zboj.htm Village of Zboj] at [http://www.iabsi.com Eastern Slovakia Research Strategies] *[http://www.regionsnina.sk/index.php?id=41&L=1 Zboj] at [http://www.regionsnina.sk Snina Region Tourism] {{Snina District}} {{coord|49|02|N|22|29|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Snina District]] {{Prešov-geo-stub}}
